isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION WITH WTEC III ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - DESCRIPTION - SPARE "INPUT AND OUTPUT" FEATURES

svcproc.title: SPARE "INPUT AND OUTPUT" FEATURES
svcproc.para: The spare inputs/outputs are circuits that can be used to activate up to four auxiliary functions programmed into the electronic control unit (ECU) of the transmission. International installed options that use the spare input/output circuits include Two-Speed Axle shift controls and Exhaust Brake. These installations are discussed later in this section.
Refer to the Allison WT Service Manual for additional information on customer installations utilizing this feature.
